verses.name: Acts 23:32
verses.text: On the morrow they left the horsemen to go with him, and returned to the castle:

verses.name: Acts 23:33
verses.text: Who, when they came to Cesarea, and delivered the epistle to the governor, presented Paul also before him.

verses.name: Acts 23:34
verses.text: And when the governor had read the letter, he asked of what province he was. And when he understood that he was of Cilicia;

verses.name: Acts 23:35
verses.text: I will hear thee, said he, when thine accusers are also come. And he commanded him to be kept in Herod’s judgment hall.
